mapper.select: SELECT b.board_seq, b.board_name, b.board_wdate, b.board_status, m.mem_id FROM tb_board AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS m ON b.mem_seq = m.mem_seq ORDER BY b.board_seq DESC

SELECT b.board_seq, b.board_name, b.board_contents, b.board_wdate, b.board_likescount, m.mem_id, m.mem_img FROM tb_board AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS m ON b.mem_seq = m.mem_seq WHERE b.board_seq=#{board_seq}
SELECT c.cmt_seq, c.cmt_contents, c.cmt_wdate, c.cmt_status, c.mem_seq, m.mem_id FROM tb_comment AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS m ON c.mem_seq = m.mem_seq ORDER BY c.cmt_seq DESC
SELECT boardfile_name FROM tb_boardfile WHERE board_seq = #{board_seq}
